SELECT `zyid`, `zymc`, `sjzyid`, `zylj`, `zytb`, `zyms`, `zylx`, `yxbz`, `zypx`, (select count(0) from xtwh_zyxx t where t.sjzyid = xtwh_zyxx.zyid) ejzy_size FROM xtwh_zyxx
and sjzyid is null and zylx = 0
order by zypx asc
